game_description: The legends say that the Almighty Infernal Drake's power was stored in magical puzzle pieces scattered around his cave, alongside precious treasures he possessed. YOU, an inexperienced mage with an amazing ability- put pieces back together, finally arrived at his cave. There was a broken magic book glimmering faintly, and you decided to take a closer look... Will you be able to retrieve the lost power of Infernal Drake and uncover the hidden mystery? *No dragons were harmed in the making of this game. ************************************** Magic Puzzle presents 3D fantasy jigsaw puzzling on VR platform. The game is still in development, we're a small team with great enthusiasm to improve the game as much as we can. Come join our discord and tell us what you think about it! https://discord.gg/6NVt99wtry
review_1: Magic Puzzle: Dragon & Sword is a video game that has become popular among puzzle game enthusiasts. The game is set in a magical world filled with dragons, swords, and other mythical creatures. Players are tasked with matching different puzzle pieces in order to progress through the game's various levels. One of the things that sets Magic Puzzle: Dragon & Sword apart from other puzzle games is its colorful and detailed graphics. The game's world is full of vibrant and imaginative creatures and landscapes, making it a joy to explore and play in. The game's music and sound effects are also well done, adding to the overall immersive experience. Another standout feature of Magic Puzzle: Dragon & Sword is its challenging but fair gameplay. Players must match puzzle pieces in order to clear the board and progress to the next level. The puzzle pieces come in a variety of different shapes and sizes, and they must be matched according to specific patterns in order to clear the board. Magic Puzzle: Dragon & Sword is an excellent puzzle game that offers an engaging and entertaining experience for players. Its challenging gameplay and colorful graphics make it a must-play for fans of puzzle games.
